Check out the sale price on this tire

Consistently rated as excellent by 245-70r17.5 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 245/70R17.5 Tire Size
245/70R17.5 tires are mostly installed on commercial vehicles and are best suited for line haul and regional transport purposes. 245/70R17.5 tires are designed to perform excellently on highways and commonly feature deep circumferential grooves that allow the tires to perform in wet conditions.

Looking for a new set of 245/70R17.5 tires for your commercial vehicle? You can consider buying the [Toyo M1430](https://simpletire.com/brands/toyo-tires/m1430) , Roadmaster RM272, and Continental HLT2 Eco Plus if you need a 245/70R17.5 tire for your commercial vehicle. Fortunately, you can also buy tires for trailer applications.

Whether you need a drive, steer, trailer, or all position tire for your commercial vehicle, SimpleTire has a wide range of 245/70R17.5 tires that meet your needs at a greater price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
